## ListPoliciesRequest.nameRegexp property

Only include policies with a name matching the given regular expression.

**Signature:**

```typescript
nameRegexp?: string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Regular expressions must use the [RE2 syntax](https://golang.org/s/re2syntax)<!-- -->. Note that backreferences are not supported.

Requires the Cerbos policy decision point server to be at least v0.29.
